enhanced_description: MiHCM is a comprehensive, end-to-end HR and Employee Experiences platform designed to run on Microsoft Azure infrastructure. It provides seamless HR & Payroll capabilities, covering Workforce Management, Talent Management, and HR insights, all with complete mobile-first access. This enterprise-grade Digital HR solution caters to the HR needs of enterprises across any industry vertical and company size, from small to global enterprises. It's specifically designed for diverse work cultures, with a special focus on the Asian work culture, incorporating relevant features and functionality. MiHCM is committed to driving employee engagement, satisfaction, enthusiasm, and dedication, ultimately transforming employee potential into exceptional performance through its talent management focus and highly configurable workflow builder.
